techmeme.title: Filing: Dell says it had about 108K employees as of January 31, 2025, down from 120K employees in February 2024, marking a 10% annual reduction in its workforce (Polly Thompson/Business Insider)
Oracle customers confirm the authenticity of data samples shared by a threat actor who allegedly breached Oracle Cloud servers, after Oracle denied the breach (Lawrence Abrams/BleepingComputer)
Google says it plans to develop Android fully in private to streamline the development process but will continue to publish the source code for new releases (Mishaal Rahman/Android Authority)
xAI's Grok AI chatbot is now integrated with Telegram for Telegram Premium users, marking Grok's first big expansion beyond X (Andrew Hutchinson/Social Media Today)
Utah Gov. Spencer Cox signs a bill requiring Apple's and Google's mobile app stores to verify user ages and require parental consent for minors to use some apps (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
